talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, but... There's something I want to hear again.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
So you're going to find my doll now?
<html>$Ask the Star Lord$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Didn't you say you lost a doll earlier?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Eh? What?

$Young Girl$
Right! My Pouzzi. I already told you that it's a limited edition and the only doll of its kind in the whole world.
She's my best friend!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(… A doll? It doesn't make sense that they'd take it to the <FONT color=#086171>Plentiful Gold Trove</FONT>…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Those soldiers took it from me.
They said they were taking it to Lady Hwaran's Storage! They were so mean!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(She must mean the <FONT color=#086171>Silver Treasure Vault</FONT>. I should check there.) Okay, don't worry.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Sniff… Sniff… Then, you promise me… you'll bring it back…?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What a smart girl… Hahaha… I will be back!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Really? I told you that not long ago.
You forget already?
(Tears in her eyes, she stares at you suspiciously.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Silver Treasure Vault... Will the guard let me in?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Please find my best friend! I'm begging you!
※ Talk to the girl to sneak into the Silver Treasure Vault.

${user_nick}$
Oh, right. I can only go in alone.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Silver Treasure Vault... Will the guard let me in?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Please find my best friend! I'm begging you!
※ Talk to the girl to sneak into the Silver Treasure Vault.

${user_nick}$
Oh, right. I can only go in alone.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
... Oh?! Who might you be?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Haha… Oh my… Oh my!
(Suddenly, the impostor is smiling brightly...?)

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Really! Really! My goodness! Look who it is! I can't believe this!
If it isn't the Star of Pymon's Mercenaries! The Blade of the Winds! The Gentleman of the Monolith!

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Ahahaha, you really are handsome!
I love it! So fresh! So thrilling! You're as cool as I expected, {user_nick}!

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
You're speechless! I get it.
It's understandable upon first encountering such cosmic coolness.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But seriously, what's with that face? It's exactly the same as mine! What's your deal?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Me? Can't you tell?
Call me Transformation Thief Shooting Star★.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(What's this feeling? It sounds like a compliment, <FONT color=#a82424>but I feel really bad</FONT>.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Ah, well, you know, I wasn't always this handsome.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I think it's definitely a compliment, but somehow I feel bad.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
I was merely a weak cripple before.
All I could do was admire from afar that handsome 'Star of Pymon's Mercenaries,' and his self-made strength.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
But, one day… the Star☆Lord… the Star Lord bestowed a revelation upon me.
Through the indescribable counterflow of cosmic entropy, the energy of the Shooting Star descended upon me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Whaaat?! But why… Why are you doing all this?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Strength just like you! Soaring power like star★light!
When I opened my eyes and looked in the mirror… there was a new me♥.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Well, I couldn't stand around and do nothing with this power!
Unlike you{user_nick} with your busy schedule, I would work to fulfill the dreams of others!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, none of that matters. What am I supposed to do if you get in a fight with soldiers?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
I am fulfilling the wishes of boys and girls who are weak like I was!
I brought back the father of a boy and
retrieved the stolen doll of a girl!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What does being strong have to do with being a Phantom Thief?! Besides, where do you get off going around with my face?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
You truly are humble, {user_nick}! That shouldn't matter for someone as strong as you.
I am so happy I can be a Phantom Thief thanks to the power bestowed by the Star Lord.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Huh? Why wouldn't someone want to become a
mysterious mercenary and ☆Phantom Thief★
after getting the mystical transformation power to become such a cool mercenary?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Silver Treasure Vault... Will the guard let me in?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Please find my best friend! I'm begging you!
※ Talk to the girl to sneak into the Silver Treasure Vault.

${user_nick}$
Oh, right. I can only go in alone.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Kali$
… From what I've seen so far…

$Kali$
Um… Since he began chanting some kind of odd spell?

$Kali$
I came at the request of Healer Kanna… Are you guys…
twins separated at birth or something?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Hehehehehe, we are quite identical, aren't we?
This coolness, this strength! I really… really like it! Oh my, I'm so beautiful!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It seems Lagendia is a pretty rough place in its own right.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
Yes. I just… just… had a bad memory…

$Kali$
Anyway, Kanna hired me to take you to her. That's doable, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We can return the doll later. Come with us for now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
But… I am responsible for fulfilling that girl's wish.
I did my best to retrieve that doll, after all.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't you realize that the Star Lord has violated my <FONT color=#a82424>portrait rights</FONT> Let's just go, okay?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
But, but, the Star Lord gave me this power to
fulfill the wishes of pitiful boys and girls…

$Kali$
Come on. Kanna will be waiting in the Streets.
※ Talk to Kanna, who is waiting in Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

$Healer Kanna$
What is it this time?

$Healer Kanna$
(Stares at Shooting Star for a long time.) This is a result of transformation?
Your freckles are even the same. You sure you two… aren't twins separated at birth or something?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
No way! No way am I twins with {user_nick}!
{user_nick} is…

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
... The Star of Pymon's Mercenaries! The Blade of the Winds! The Gentleman of the Monolith!
The Healer's Protector! The Mad Alpaca Dancer! Cat Dance Virtuoso!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Should I kill this Shooting Star? Killing him will solve everything, right?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
(Looks exasperated)
…………

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
He is the best mercenary ever who combines self-made strength and handsomeness!
He even has a fan club! A fan club!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Kanna, look, this has nothing to do with me...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$ Healer Kanna $
…………

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We have to get rid of him, right? Kanna?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$ Healer Kanna $
………………………………………

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Oh, no. I'm going to be teased for life.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Bwahahaha! Bwahahahahahaha!
Did you hear that {user_nick}? He said 'fan club'! You have a fan club… Hahahaha!
Just-… Hahaha-... How many people are in that fan club?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I knew I would have to kill him!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Just one person at the moment, but it's sure to grow.
Along with the fame of the Transformation Thief Shooting Star,
{user_nick}'s fan club members are going to explode!

$Healer Kanna$
(Laughing to the point of tears.)
Okay, great…. Really great.

$Kali$
Huh? What did you just say…?

$Healer Kanna$
You know, how about you do something to help {user_nick}?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
I'm so pleased you understand my intentions!
That's why I took on {user_nick}'s appearance and became a Phantom Thief who fulfills everyone's wishes!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It's over... I will be teased with every breath I take.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
No, not that. You need to stop doing that. You're being a nuisance.
Bwaha… You've violated... Bahaha… {user_nick}'s portrait rights… Haha.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Ah… This is a legal matter... My apologies!
But it was an opportunity granted by cosmic entropy!

$Healer Kanna$
Alright, let's look on the bright side and look at this as an opportunity.
You should compensate {user_nick} for his portrait rights and help {user_nick} out.
What do you think about working part-time for our clinic?

$Healer Kanna$
You can do it to pay off the compensation for violating his portrait rights. It's not a hard job.
Hmm, I think wearing that outfit should attract enough eyes.
I'd rather you kindly spread leaflets in his clothing than dance around in his Alpaca suit
.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Great! I can't outdo the Cat Dance Virtuoso {user_nick},
but if I can shine the starlight of love into everyone's hearts, what more could I ask?

$Healer Kanna$
Now, allow me to give you your first mission.
Can you chant that transformation spell for me?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I want to annihilate him where he stands.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star${sound:npc_Vandar_qu3895_sp_01.ogg}
Brilliant Star Lord who illuminates the night sky! Reveal to me that handsome and pretty Star of Pymon's Mercenaries!
The Shining Shooting☆ Star!

$Healer Kanna$
(Applauds)
Excellent! Well done! More, more!

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star${sound:npc_Vandar_qu3895_sp_02.ogg}
Bring the light of love to everyone's hearts!
Shine it down, down, super shining starlight!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Kanna, do you think this is at all reasonable?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
You passed the test! With flying colors! Well done, Master Shooting Star! Go and begin your first mission.
Hand out all these flyers and I'll buy you a meal!

$Healer Kanna$
I'll fill you in when we return to the clinic. Okay?
Kali, you can collect your payment at the clinic.

$Healer Kanna$
So, what was it you wanted to talk about?

$Healer Kanna$
Oh, our cute little unpaid part-timer, Master Shooting Star?

$Healer Kanna$
You've danced in an alpaca suit more than a few times, so why can't he do that for a while too?
And his face is just perfect. The Star of Pymon's Mercenaries, bwaha...! The Gentleman… of the… Monol-, bahaha…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why should I have to do it?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Well, if you hate the idea so much, do it yourself. That way he won't have to.
Go ahead! You heard him chant that spell, right?

$Kali$
Yeah, I don't really want to see him do that…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(My word... Fine, just take a deep breath and…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Um, cosmic… what was it? He really got into it at that point.
Okay, do it just like that and if you pass the test, I'll fire him!

${user_nick}$
Radiant what's his name shining through the night… Ugh, help me out here. I can't do it.
I'd rather die, Kanna… Honestly, you're killing me right now!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I have so much to say, yet I'm somehow at a loss for words.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Brilliant Star Lord who illuminates☆ the night sky! Reveal to me that handsome and pretty Star of Pymon's Mercenaries!
The Shining Shooting★Star!
You can't do that much? I guess you're not that desperate, then.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Uh, hello? Can you tell her this isn't right? Please?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
Well, it seems like you have everything under control here, so I'll get going.

$Healer Kanna$
Oh, good job earlier, Kali.
Here's your payment, as promised. Thank you so much.
(Kali withdraws.)

$Healer Kanna$
There, we finally got ourselves a part-timer to promote the clinic!
Now all that's left is for the cash to flow in!
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Finding the Impostor at Last
journal.contents:
The boy is nowhere to be found, but this time a young girl seems to be looking for the impostor. That guy sure does get around quickly. You'll have to talk to the girl to figure out where he might be.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Young Girl
journal.destination: Talk to the Young Girl on the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Talk to the Young Girl in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

journal.title: Upon Going to the Silver Treasure Vault
journal.contents:
You will have to enter the Silver Treasure Vault to find the impostor… Maybe you can use a back road?
※ Talk to the Young Girl to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Young Girl
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with the Girl and enter the Silver Treasure Vault
journal.todo_msg: Set out for the Silver Treasure Vault to catch the impostor.

journal.title: Foolishness in the Silver Treasure Vault
journal.contents:
Upon entering the Silver Treasure Vault, you find the impostor Transformation Thief Shooting Star, who puts on quite a performance. What an idiot! How does he think he can get away with impersonating someone like that?
※ You can enter the Silver Treasure Vault by speaking with the Young Girl in the Streets.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace (Young Girl) - Silver Treasure Vault (Transformation Thief Shooting Star)
journal.todo_msg: You found the impostor, Shooting Star! Speak with him.

journal.title: How can that be?
journal.contents:
Everything that came out of the Transformation Thief Shooting Star's mouth was completely unbelievable. Then Kali appeared. Just how much of that did she hear?!
※ You can enter the Silver Treasure Vault by speaking with the Young Girl in the Streets.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace (Young Girl) - Silver Treasure Vault (Kali)
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Kali in the Silver Treasure Vault
journal.todo_msg: Speak with Kali, who appear in the Silver Treasure Vault.

journal.title: Goddess, this is Completely Ridiculous
journal.contents:
Kali says she came all the here on a mission from Kanna. She's seen something she can never unsee, but you'll have to get over it and take the Shooting Star to Kanna now that you've caught him. But... Did she say Kanna went to the Streets?
※ You must speak with Kanna on the Streets of Red Lotus Palace to continue the quest.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Healer Kanna
journal.destination: Talk to Kanna on the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Take the impostor to Kanna, who came all the way to the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

journal.title: What a Ridiculous Outcome!
journal.contents:
Speak with Healer Kanna on Red Lotus Palace Main Street.
This is ridiculous! Not only are we not punishing the impostor, we're giving him a job? This won't do. You are going to have to talk this out with Kanna!

Red Lotus Palace Main Street-Healer Kanna
journal.destination: Talk to Healer Kanna at Red Lotus Palace Main Street
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Healer Kanna at Red Lotus Palace Main Street.
